info.title: Contract Manager API
info.description: Availables routes through the Contract Manager API

post.summary: Inject multiple policies into a contract

get.summary: Get all contracts with optional filter on the contract status
Get contracts for a specific DID with an optional filter

parameters.name: hasSigned
parameters.description: Filter contracts based on signature status

put.summary: Update an existing contract by ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the contract to update

get.summary: Get the policies for a given service offering

200.description: An array of policies related to the service offering

put.summary: Sign an existing contract by ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the contract to sign

delete.summary: Revoke the signature of a participant on a contract

post.summary: Check data exploitability for a contract
Inject a policy into a contract
Inject multiple policies into a contract
Inject policies for a role into a contract

parameters.name: policies
parameters.description: Array of policy data for a given role.

post.summary: Inject policies for specified groups of role

parameters.name: policies
parameters.description: Array of policies associated with a group of roles.

post.summary: Inject policies for an offering into a contract

parameters.name: policies
parameters.description: Array of policy data for a given role.

200.description: Data has been added to the store.

get.description: Endpoint to log in a user.
